Row.Text: When all the men bow their heads in submission, only I stand for what is right.
The breeze from Fan Si Pan was cool this evening, and the Red River flows calm. And here you are.
The breeze from Fan Si Pan was cool this evening, and the Red River flows calm. And here you are.
The breeze from Fan Si Pan was cool this evening, and the Red River flows calm. And here you are.
We have borne your insults for too long. I will not bow my head when there is injustice.
The land will fight you. The rivers will rise against you. The sky will cast fire down upon you. You will not succeed.
My ancestors await. My voice will be lost to time, but I will dwell with them in paradise.
In harmony, like land and water.
My people's interests come first. No.
